Name: DailyHeartlandsNews/NautilusAppears
Body: Desert nomads report encounters with 'Sir Nautilus,' a towering figure clad in barnacle-encrusted armor who offers cryptic quests. Those who accept receive enchanted pearls; those who refuse claim their shadows 'twist into eels.' Scholars speculate he's a remnant of Ilmeris' knightly order, though his obsession with 'the Leviathan's lost egg' raises concerns. Approach with caution.
